entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near Cape Race early this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
